scripts.dev: pnpm run build && concurrently "pnpm -C packages/notivue run watch" "pnpm install && pnpm -C demo run dev"
scripts.preview: pnpm run build && pnpm -C demo run preview
scripts.build:demo: pnpm run build && pnpm install && pnpm -C demo run build
scripts.test: pnpm run build && pnpm install && pnpm -C tests run test
scripts.test:gui: pnpm -C packages/notivue run build && concurrently "pnpm -C packages/notivue run watch" "pnpm install && pnpm -C tests run test:gui"
